name: Make A Furb
description:
Have some fun making your own Furby!

Made over an unnecessary amount of time for little to no reason other than the fact that I love engaging in projects that I don't actually have the skills or knowledge to finish at the time. This took a lot of work, but I actually finished it, which is worth a pat on the back at least. 

This was built for 16:9 resolutions -- I recommend firing it up in a windowed 1600x900 or something of the sort if you don't have a native 16:9 resolution.
